Label.LabelText: Statistical Classification of Economic Activities in the European Community, Rev. 1 (1990)

PropertyQualifier.name: PlainText
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: Statistical Classification of Economic Activities in the European Community, Rev. 1 (1990)

Label.LabelText: Agriculture, hunting and related service activities
Growing of crops; market gardening; horticulture
Growing of cereals and other crops n.e.c.

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - growing of cereal grains: hard and soft wheat, rye, barley, oats, maize, rice, etc. - growing of potatoes - growing of sugar beet - growing of tobacco, including its preliminary processing: harvesting and drying of tobacco leaves - growing of oilseeds or oleaginous fruit: peanuts, soya, colza, etc. - production of sugar beet seeds and forage plant seeds (including grasses) - growing of hop cones, roots and tubers with a high starch or inulin content - growing of cotton; growing of diverse textile plants; retting of plants bearing vegetable fibres - growing of dried leguminous vegetables such as field peas and beans - growing of plants used chiefly in pharmacy or for insecticidal, fungicidal or similar purposes - growing of crops n.e.c.

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - growing of melons, see 01.12 - growing of sweet corn, see 01.12 - growing of other vegetables, see 01.12 - growing of flowers, see 01.12 - production of flower and vegetable seeds, see 01.12 - growing of horticultural specialities, see 01.12 - growing of olives, see 01.13 - growing of beverage crops, see 01.13 - growing of spice crops, see 01.13 - growing of nuts, see 01.13 - gathering of forest products and other wild growing material, see 02.01 - growing of vegetable materials used for plaiting, see 02.01

Label.LabelText: Growing of vegetables, horticultural specialities and nursery products

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - growing of vegetables: tomatoes, melons, onions, cabbages, lettuce, cucumbers, carrots, beans, cress, sweet corn, courgettes, egg-plants, leeks - growing of seasoning herbs and vegetables: capers, 'peppers', fennel, parsley, chervil, tarragon, sweet marjoram - growing of mushrooms, gathering of forest mushrooms or truffles - growing of flowers - production of seeds for flowers, fruit or vegetables - growing of plants for planting or ornamental purposes, including turf for transplanting

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - growing of potatoes, see 01.11 - growing of sugar beets, see 01.11 - growing of oilseeds and oleaginous fruit, see 01.11 - growing of roots and tubers with a high starch or inulin content, see 01.11 - growing of cotton or other vegetable textile materials, see 01.11 - growing of spice crops, see 01.13 - growing of olives, see 01.13 - operation of forest tree nurseries, see 02.01 - growing of Christmas trees, see 02.01

Label.LabelText: Growing of fruit, nuts, beverage and spice crops

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - production of fruit: apples, pears, citrus fruit, apricots, strawberries, berries, cherries, peaches, bananas, avocados, dates, etc. - production of wine grapes and table grapes - production of wine from self-produced grapes - production of edible nuts, including coconuts - growing of beverage crops such as coffee, cocoa, tea, mate - growing of spice crops: bay, basil, anise, coriander, cumin, cinnamon, cloves, nutmeg, ginger, etc. - growing of olives for oil production and for direct consumption - production of olive oil from self-produced olives

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - growing of peanuts, see 01.11 - growing of hop cones, see 01.11 - growing of fruit bearing vegetables, e.g. tomatoes, melons, cucumbers, etc., see 01.12 - growing of fresh 'peppers', parsley and tarragon, see 01.12 - production of olive oil other than from self-produced olives, see 15.42 - manufacture of cocoa, see 15.84 - processing of tea leaves and coffee, see 15.86 - production of wines other than from self-produced grapes, see 15.93

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - farming of cattle - production of raw cow milk

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - animal boarding and care, see 01.42 - processing of milk outside the farm, see 15.51

Label.LabelText: Farming of sheep, goats, horses, asses, mules and hinnies

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - farming and breeding of horses, asses, mules or hinnies - farming of sheep and goats - production of raw wool - production of raw sheep or goat milk

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - sheep shearing on a fee or contract basis, see 01.42 - production of pulled wool, see 15.11 - operation of racing stables and riding academies, see 92.62

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - raising of poultry: • turkeys, ducks, chickens, geese and guinea fowl or guinea hens - production of eggs

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - farming of other birds, see 01.25 - production of feathers or downs, see 15.12

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - bee keeping and production of honey and beeswax - raising of rabbits - breeding of pet animals - raising of fur animals, production of raw furskins - raising of silk worms, production of silk worm cocoons - raising of water reptiles and frogs in basins - raising of snails - raising of diverse animals

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - animal boarding and care, see 01.42 - production of hides and skins originating from hunting and trapping, see 01.50 - training of dogs for security reasons, see 74.60 - training of pet animals, see 92.72

Label.LabelText: Growing of crops combined with farming of animals (mixed farming)
Growing of crops combined with farming of animals (mixed farming)

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - crop growing in combination with farming of livestock at mixed activity units with a specialization ratio in either one of less than 66% of standard gross margins

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - mixed cropping or mixed livestock units, see their main activity

Label.LabelText: Agricultural and animal husbandry service activities, except veterinary activities

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - agricultural activities on a fee or contract basis: • preparation of fields • establishing a crop • treatment of crops • crop spraying, including by air • trimming of fruit trees and vines • transplanting of rice, thinning of beets • harvesting and preparation of crops for primary markets, i.e. cleaning, trimming, grading, decorticating, retting, cooling or bulk packaging • pest control (including rabbits) in connection with agriculture - operation of irrigation systems - laying out, planting and maintenance of gardens, parks and green areas for sport installations and the like

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - tree pruning and hedge trimming - provision of agricultural machinery with operators and crew

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - preparation of vegetable fibres, see 17.1 - marketing activities of commission merchants and cooperative associations, see 51 - activities of agronomists and agricultural economists, see 74.14 - planning and design of gardens and sport installations, see 74.20 - organization of agricultural shows and fairs, see 74.84

Label.LabelText: Animal husbandry service activities, except veterinary activities

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - agricultural activities on a fee or contract basis: • activities related to artificial insemination • herd testing services, droving services, agistment services, poultry caponizing, coop cleaning, etc. • activities to promote propagation, growth and output of animals • animal boarding and care

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - provision of feed lot services, see 01.2 - service activities to promote commercial hunting and trapping, see 01.50 - marketing activities of commission merchants and cooperative associations, see 51 - activities of agronomists and agricultural economists, see 74.14 - veterinary activities, see 85.20

Label.LabelText: Hunting, trapping and game propagation, including related service activities
Hunting, trapping and game propagation, including related service activities

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - hunting and trapping of animals for food, fur, skin, or for use in research, in zoos or as pets - production of furskins, reptile or bird skins from hunting or trapping activities - game propagation - service activities to promote commercial hunting and trapping

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - catching of sea mammals such as walrus and seal

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - production of furskins, reptile or bird skins from ranching operations, see 01.25 - raising of animals on ranching operations, see 01.25 - catching of whales, see 05.01 - production of hides and skins originating from slaughterhouses, see 15.11 - hunting for sport or recreation, see 92.62

Label.LabelText: Forestry, logging and related service activities
Forestry, logging and related service activities

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - growing of standing timber: planting, replanting, transplanting, thinning and conserving of forests and timber tracts - growing of coppice and pulpwood - operation of forest tree nurseries - growing of Christmas trees - logging: felling of timber and production of wood in the rough such as pit-props, split poles, pickets or fuel wood - growing of vegetable materials used for plaiting

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - gathering of wild growing forest materials: balatta and other rubber-like gums, cork, lac, resins, balsams, vegetable hair, eel grass, acorns, horse-chestnuts, mosses, lichens

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - growing and gathering of mushrooms or truffles, see 01.12 - gathering of berries or nuts, see 01.13 - production of wood chips, see 20.10

Label.LabelText: Forestry and logging related service activities

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - forestry service activities: forestry inventories, timber evaluation, fire protection - logging service activities: transport of logs within the forest

Label.LabelText: Fishing, operation of fish hatcheries and fish farms; service activities incidental to fishing
Fishing, operation of fish hatcheries and fish farms; service activities incidental to fishing

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - fishing in ocean, coastal or inland waters - taking of marine and freshwater crustaceans and molluscs - hunting of aquatic animals: turtles, sea squirts, tunicates, sea urchins, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - gathering of marine materials: natural pearls, sponges, coral and algae - service activities incidental to fishing

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - capturing of sea mammals, except whales, e.g. walruses, seals, see 01.50 - processing of fish, crustaceans and molluscs not connected to fishing, i.e. on vessels only engaged in processing and preserving fish, or in factories ashore, see 15.20 - fishing practised for sport or recreation and related services, see 92.72

Label.LabelText: Operation of fish hatcheries and fish farms

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - production of oyster spat, mussel, lobsterlings, shrimp post-larvae, fish fry and fingerlings - growing of laver and other edible seaweeds - fish farming in sea and fresh water - cultivation of oysters - service activities incidental to the operation of fish hatcheries and fish farms

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - frog farming, see 01.25 - operation of sport fishing preserves, see 92.72

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - agglomeration of coals and ores

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - bottling of natural spring and mineral waters at springs and wells, see 15.98 - crushing, grinding or otherwise treating certain earths, rocks and minerals not carried on in conjunction with mining and quarrying, see 26.81, 26.82 - collection, purification and distribution of water, see 41.00 - mineral prospecting, see 74.20

Label.LabelText: Mining and quarrying of energy producing materials
Mining of coal and lignite; extraction of peat
Mining and agglomeration of hard coal
Mining and agglomeration of hard coal

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - mining of hard coal: underground or surface mining - cleaning, sizing, grading, pulverizing, etc. of coal - agglomeration of hard coal

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - recovery of hard coal from tips

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - coke ovens producing solid fuels, see 23.10

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - mining of lignite (brown coal): underground or surface mining - washing, dehydrating, pulverizing of lignite - agglomeration of lignite

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - peat digging - peat agglomeration

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of articles of peat, see 26.82

Label.LabelText: Extraction of crude petroleum and natural gas; service activities incidental to oil and gas extraction, excluding surveying
Extraction of crude petroleum and natural gas
Extraction of crude petroleum and natural gas

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - extraction of crude petroleum - production of crude gaseous hydrocarbon (natural gas) - extraction of condensates - draining and separation of liquid hydrocarbon fractions - liquefaction and regasification of natural gas for transportation - gas desulphurization

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - extraction of bituminous shale and sand - production of crude petroleum from bituminous shale and sand

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - service activities incidental to oil and gas extraction, see 11.20 - manufacture of refined petroleum products, see 23.20 - recovery of liquefied petroleum gases in the refining of petroleum, see 23.20 - operation of pipelines, see 60.30 - oil and gas exploration, see 74.20

Label.LabelText: Service activities incidental to oil and gas extraction, excluding surveying
Service activities incidental to oil and gas extraction, excluding surveying

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - oil and gas extraction service activities provided on a fee or contract basis: • directional drilling and redrilling; 'spudding in'; derrick erection in situ, repairing and dismantling; cementing oil and gas well casings; pumping of wells; plugging and abandoning wells, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - geophysical, geological and seismographic surveys, see 74.20

Label.LabelText: Mining of uranium and thorium ores
Mining of uranium and thorium ores
Mining of uranium and thorium ores

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - mining of uranium and thorium ores - concentration of such ores - manufacture of yellowcake

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - enrichment of uranium and thorium ores, see 23.30 - production of fissile or fertile material, see 23.30 - production of uranium metal, see 23.30

Label.LabelText: Mining and quarrying, except of energy producing materials

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - underground and open-cast extraction of metal ores and native metals - preparation of ores: • crushing and grinding of ores, washing of ores • concentrating of ores by magnetic or gravimetric separation • flotation, screening, grading, drying, calcination and roasting of ores

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - mining of uranium and thorium ores, see 12.00 - roasting of iron pyrites, see 24.13 - production of aluminium oxide, see 27.42

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - mining of ores valued chiefly for iron content - beneficiation and agglomeration of iron ores

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - pyrites and pyrrhotite mining and preparation, see 14.30

Label.LabelText: Mining of non-ferrous metal ores, except uranium and thorium ores
Mining of non-ferrous metal ores, except uranium and thorium ores

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - mining and preparation of ores valued chiefly for non-ferrous metal content: • aluminium (bauxite), copper, lead, zinc, tin, manganese, chrome, nickel, cobalt, molybdenum, tantalum, vanadium, etc. • precious metals: gold, silver, platinum

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - mining and preparation of uranium and thorium ores, see 12.00 - production of aluminium oxide and mattes of nickel or of copper, see 27.4

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - quarrying, rough trimming and sawing of monumental and building stone such as marble, granite and sandstone, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - mining of chemical and fertilizer minerals, see 14.30 - cutting, shaping and finishing of stone outside quarries, see 26.70

Label.LabelText: Quarrying of limestone, gypsum and chalk

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - quarrying, crushing and breaking of limestone - mining of gypsum and anhydrite - mining of chalk and dolomite

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - mining of chemical and fertilizer minerals, see 14.30

Label.LabelText: Operation of gravel and sand pits

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - extraction and dredging of industrial sand, sand for construction and gravel - breaking and crushing of stone, gravel and sand

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - mining of bituminous sand, see 11.10 - mining of chemical and fertilizer minerals, see 14.30

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - mining of clays, refractory clays and kaolin

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - mining of chemical and fertilizer minerals, see 14.30

Label.LabelText: Mining of chemical and fertilizer minerals
Mining of chemical and fertilizer minerals

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - mining of natural phosphates and natural potassium salts - mining of native sulphur - extraction and preparation of pyrites and pyrrhotite - mining of natural barium sulphate and carbonate (barytes and witherite), natural borates, natural magnesium sulphates (kieserite) - mining of earth colours and fluorspar

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - guano mining

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - production of salt, see 14.40 - roasting of iron pyrites, see 24.13 - manufacture of synthetic fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, see 24.15

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - extraction of salt from underground including by dissolving and pumping - salt production by evaporation of sea water or other saline waters - production of brine and other saline solutions - crushing, purification and refining of salt

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - potable water production by evaporation of saline water, see 41.00

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - mining and quarrying of various minerals and materials: • abrasive materials, asbestos, siliceous fossil meals, natural graphite, steatite (talc), feldspar, etc. • gem stones, quartz, mica, etc. • natural asphalt and bitumen

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of food products, beverages and tobacco
Manufacture of food products and beverages
Production, processing and preserving of meat and meat products

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - production of fresh, chilled or frozen meat, in carcasses - production of fresh, chilled or frozen meat, in cuts

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - production of hides and skins originating from slaughterhouses, including fellmongery - rendering of edible fats of animal origin - processing of animal offal - production of pulled wool

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - packaging of meat for own account by the wholesale trade, see 51.32 - packaging of meat on a fee or contract basis, see 74.82

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - slaughtering of poultry - preparation of poultrymeat - production of fresh or frozen poultrymeat in individual portions

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - slaughtering of rabbits and the like - preparation of rabbit meat and the like - production of feathers and down

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - packaging of poultrymeat for own account by the wholesale trade, see 51.32 - packaging of poultrymeat on a fee or contract basis, see 74.82

Label.LabelText: Production of meat and poultrymeat products

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - production of dried, salted or smoked meat - production of meat products: • sausages, salami, puddings, 'andouillettes', saveloys, bolognas, pâtés, galentines, rillettes, boiled ham, meat extracts and juices - production of prepared meat dishes

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - packaging of meat and poultrymeat for own account by the wholesale trade, see 51.32 - packaging of meat and poultrymeat on a fee or contract basis, see 74.82

Label.LabelText: Processing and preserving of fish and fish products
Processing and preserving of fish and fish products

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - preparation and preservation of fish, crustaceans and molluscs: freezing, deep-freezing, drying, smoking, salting, immersing in brine, canning, etc. - production of fish, crustacean and mollusc products: cooked fish, fish fillets, roes, caviar, caviar substitutes, etc. - production of prepared fish dishes

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - activities of vessels only engaged in the processing and preserving of fish

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - activities of vessels engaged both in fishing, processing and preserving of fish, see 05.01 - production of oils and fats from marine material, see 15.41 - manufacture of fish soups, see 15.89

Label.LabelText: Processing and preserving of fruit and vegetables

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - production of prepared frozen potatoes - production of dehydrated mashed potatoes - production of potato snacks - production of potato crisps - manufacture of potato flour and meal

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - industrial peeling of potatoes

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of fruit and vegetable juice

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - production of concentrates and nectars

Label.LabelText: Processing and preserving of fruit and vegetables n.e.c.

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - preserving of fruit, nuts or vegetables: freezing, drying, immersing in oil or in vinegar, canning, etc. - manufacture of fruit or vegetable food products - manufacture of jams, marmalades and table jellies

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of flour or meal of dried leguminous vegetables, see 15.61 - preservation of fruit and nuts in sugar, see 15.84

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of vegetable and animal oils and fats
Manufacture of crude oils and fats

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - production of crude vegetable oils: olive oil, soya-bean oil, palm oil, sunflower-seed oil, cotton-seed oil, rape, colza or mustard oil, linseed oil, etc. - production of non-defatted flour or meal of oilseeds, oil nuts or oil kernels

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText:
- production of non-edible animal oils and fats - extraction of fish and marine mammal oils
Note: Cotton linters, oilcakes and other residual products of oil production are by-products of this class

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - rendering and refining of lard and other edible animal fats, see 15.11 - wet corn milling, see 15.62 - production of essential oils, see 24.63

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of refined oils and fats

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - production of refined vegetable oils: olive oil, soya-bean oil, etc. - processing of vegetable oils: blowing, boiling, oxidation, polymerization, dehydration, hydrogenation, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - production of olive oil from self-produced olives, see 01.13 - production of non-edible animal oils and fats, see 15.41 - extraction of fish and marine mammal oils, see 15.41

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of margarine and similar edible fats

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of margarine - manufacture of melanges and similar spreads - manufacture of compound cooking fats

Label.LabelText: Operation of dairies and cheese making

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - production of fresh liquid milk, pasteurized, sterilized, homogenized and/or ultra heat treated - production of cream from fresh liquid milk, pasteurized, sterilized, homogenized - manufacture of dried or concentrated milk whether or not sweetened - production of butter - production of yoghurt - production of cheese and curd - production of whey - production of casein or lactose

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - production of fresh whole raw cow milk, see 01.21

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - production of ice cream and other edible ice such as sorbet

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - activities of ice cream parlours, see 55.30

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of grain mill products, starches and starch products

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - grain milling: production of flour, groats, meal or pellets of wheat, rye, oats, maize (corn) or other cereal grains - rice milling: production of milled, polished, glazed, parboiled or converted rice; production of rice flour - vegetable milling: production of flour or meal of dried leguminous vegetables, of roots or tubers, or of edible nuts - manufacture of cereal breakfast foods - manufacture of prepared blended flour for bread, cakes, biscuits or pancakes

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of potato flour and meal, see 15.31 - wet corn milling, see 15.62

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of starches and starch products

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of starches from rice, potatoes, maize, etc. - wet corn milling - manufacture of glucose, glucose syrup, maltose, etc. - manufacture of gluten - manufacture of tapioca - manufacture of corn oil

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of lactose, see 15.51 - production of cane or beet sugar, see 15.83

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of prepared feeds for farm animals

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of prepared feeds for farm animals, including animal feed supplements - preparation of unmixed (single) feeds for farm animals

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - production of fishmeal for animal feed, see 15.20 - production of oilseed cake, see 15.41

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of bread; manufacture of fresh pastry goods and cakes

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of bread and rolls - manufacture of fresh pastry, cakes, pies, tarts, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of farinaceous products (pastas), see 15.85 - activities of lunchrooms, see 55.30

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of rusks and biscuits; manufacture of preserved pastry goods and cakes

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of rusks and biscuits and 'dry' bakery products - manufacture of preserved pastry goods and cakes - manufacture of snack products whether sweet or salted

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture or refining of sugar (sucrose) and sugar substitutes from the juice of cane, beet, maple and palm

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of glucose, glucose syrup, maltose, see 15.62

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of cocoa; chocolate and sugar confectionery

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of cocoa, cocoa butter, cocoa fat, cocoa oil - manufacture of chocolate and chocolate confectionery - manufacture of sugar confectionery - manufacture of chewing-gum - preserving in sugar of fruit, nuts, fruit-peels and other parts of plants

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - production of sucrose sugar, see 15.83

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of macaroni, noodles, couscous and similar farinaceous products

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of pastas such as macaroni and noodles, whether or not cooked or stuffed - manufacture of couscous

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - decaffeination and roasting of coffee - production of coffee products: • ground coffee • soluble coffee • extracts and concentrates of coffee - manufacture of coffee substitutes - blending of tea and mate - packing of tea including packing in tea-bags

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of herb infusions (mint, vervain, camomile, etc.)

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of tea associated with tea plantations, see 01.13 - manufacture of herb infusions if they are considered medical products, see 24.42

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of spices, sauces and condiments: • mayonnaise • mustard flour and meal • prepared mustard, etc. - manufacture of vinegar

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - growing of spice crops, see 01.13 - manufacture of table salt, see 14.40

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of homogenized food preparations and dietetic food

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of foods for particular nutritional uses (Council Directive, OJ No L 186, 30. 6. 1989): • infant formulae • follow-up milk and other follow-up foods • baby foods • low-energy and energy-reduced foods intended for weight control • dietary foods for special medical purposes • low-sodium foods, including low-sodium or sodium-free dietary salts • gluten-free foods • foods intended to meet the expenditure of intense muscular effort, especially for sportsmen • foods for persons suffering from carbohydrate metabolism disorders (diabetes)

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of other food products n.e.c.

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of soups and broths - manufacture of yeast, powdered or reconstituted eggs, etc.

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of distilled potable alcoholic beverages

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of distilled, potable, alcoholic beverages: whisky, brandy, gin, liqueurs, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of non-distilled alcoholic beverages, see 15.92, 15.93, 15.94

Label.LabelText: Production of ethyl alcohol from fermented materials

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - production of ethyl alcohol from fermented materials - production of neutral spirits

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of wine: • table wine • QWPSR wine (quality wine produced in specified regions) - manufacture of sparkling wine - manufacture of wine from concentrated grape must

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - production of wine from self-produced grapes, see 01.13 - bottling and packaging without transformation of the wine, see 51.34, 74.82

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of cider and other fruit wines
Manufacture of other non-distilled fermented beverages

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of vermouth and the like

Label.LabelText: Production of mineral waters and soft drinks

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - bottling of waters, including production of natural mineral waters - production of soft drinks: • non-alcoholic flavoured and/or sweetened waters: lemonade, orangeade, cola, fruit drinks, tonic waters, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - production of fruit and vegetable juice, see 15.32

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of tobacco products: cigarettes, cigarette tobacco, cigars, pipe tobacco, chewing tobacco, snuff - manufacture of "homogenized" or "reconstituted" tobacco

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - growing or preliminary processing of tobacco, see 01.11

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of textiles and textile products
Preparation and spinning of textile fibres
Preparation and spinning of cotton-type fibres

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - preparatory operations on cotton-type fibres, carding and combing - manufacture of cotton-type yarn, either with cotton or artificial or synthetic fibres, for weaving, knitting, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of sewing thread, see 17.16

Label.LabelText: Preparation and spinning of woollen-type fibres

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - preparatory operations on woollen-type fibres: degreasing and carbonizing of wool, carding - manufacture of woollen-type yarns, either with wool or artificial or synthetic fibres, for weaving, knitting, etc.

Label.LabelText: Preparation and spinning of worsted-type fibres

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - combing of worsted-type fibres - manufacture of worsted-type yarns, either with wool or artificial or synthetic fibres, for weaving, knitting, etc. - preparation and spinning of semi-worsted-type (carded but not fully combed) fibres

Label.LabelText: Preparation and spinning of flax-type fibres

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - scutching of flax - manufacture of flax-type yarns, either with flax or artificial or synthetic fibres, for weaving, knitting, etc.

Label.LabelText: Throwing and preparation of silk, including from noils, and throwing and texturing of synthetic or artificial filament yarns

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - reeling, washing and throwing of silk - carding and combing of silk waste - manufacture of silk-type yarns, either with silk or artificial or synthetic fibres, for weaving, knitting, etc. - texturizing, twisting, folding, cabling and dipping of synthetic or artificial filament yarns

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of sewing thread of any textile material, including mixtures

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of knitting and crocheting yarn, see 17.11 to 17.15, 17.17

Label.LabelText: Preparation and spinning of other textile fibres

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - preparatory operations and spinning of other textile fibres, such as jute or bast fibres

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of paper yarn

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of synthetic or artificial fibres and tows, manufacture of single yarns (including high tenacity yarn and yarn for carpets) of synthetic or artificial fibres, see 24.70 - manufacture of glass fibres, see 26.14 - spinning of asbestos yarn, see 26.82

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of broad woven cotton-type fabrics, either with cotton or artificial or synthetic yarns

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of woven pile or chenille fabrics, terry towelling, gauze, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of textile floor coverings, see 17.51 - manufacture of non-wovens, see 17.53 - manufacture of narrow fabrics, see 17.54 - manufacture of knitted and crocheted fabrics, see 17.6

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of broad woven woollen-type fabrics, either with wool or artificial or synthetic yarns

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of textile floor coverings, see 17.51 - manufacture of non-wovens, see 17.53 - manufacture of knitted and crocheted fabrics, see 17.60

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of broad woven worsted-type fabrics, either with wool or artificial or synthetic yarns

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of textile floor coverings, see 17.51 - manufacture of non-wovens, see 17.53 - manufacture of knitted and crocheted fabrics, see 17.60

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of broad woven silk-type fabrics either with silk or artificial or synthetic yarns

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of non-wovens, see17.53

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of other broad woven fabrics, using flax, ramie, hemp, jute, bast fibres and special yarns - manufacture of polypropylene fabrics

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of woven fabrics of glass fibres

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of textile floor coverings, see 17.51 - manufacture of non-wovens, see 17.53 - weaving of asbestos yarn, see 26.82

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - bleaching, dyeing and printing (including thermoprinting) of not self-produced textiles and textile articles, including wearing apparel - dressing, drying, steaming, shrinking, mending, sanforizing, mercerizing of not self-produced textiles and textile articles, including wearing apparel

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - finishing of textile articles made from self-produced materials, see 17.1, 17.2, 17.5

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of made-up textile articles, except apparel
Manufacture of made-up textile articles, except apparel

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of made-up articles of any textile material, including of knitted or crocheted fabrics: • blankets, including travelling rugs • bed, table, toilet or kitchen linen • quilts, eiderdowns, cushions, pouffes, pillows, sleeping bags, etc. - manufacture of made-up furnishing articles: • curtains, valances, blinds, bedspreads, furniture or machine covers, etc. • tarpaulins, tents, camping goods, sails, sun blinds, loose covers for cars, etc. • flags, banners, pennants, etc. • dustcloths, dishcloths and similar articles, life jackets, parachutes, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of the textile part of electric blankets

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of textile articles for technical use, see 17.54

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of textile including needleloom felt floor coverings: • carpets, rugs and mats, tiles

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of mats and matting of plaiting materials, see 20.52 - manufacture of floor coverings of cork, rubber or plastic materials, even when textile backed, see 20.52, 25.13, 25.23 - manufacture of linoleum and hard non-plastic surface floor coverings, see 36.63

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of cordage, rope, twine and netting

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of twine, cordage, rope and cables of textile fibres or strip or the like, whether or not impregnated, coated, covered or sheathed with rubber or plastics - manufacture of knotted netting of twine, cordage or rope - manufacture of products of rope or netting: fishing nets, ships' fenders, unloading cushions, loading slings, rope or cable fitted with metal rings, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of hairnets, see 18.24

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of non-wovens and articles made from non-wovens, except apparel

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of narrow woven fabrics, including fabrics consisting of warp without weft assembled by means of an adhesive - manufacture of felt - manufacture of labels, badges, etc. - manufacture of ornamental trimmings: • braids, tassels, pompons, etc. - manufacture of tulles and other net fabrics, and of lace and embroidery, in the piece, in strips or in motifs - manufacture of fabrics impregnated, coated, covered or laminated with plastics - manufacture of textile wadding and articles of wadding: • sanitary towels or tampons - manufacture of metallized yarn or gimped yarn, rubber thread and cord covered with textile material, textile yarn or strip covered, impregnated, coated or sheathed with rubber or plastics - manufacture of diverse fabrics: tyre cord fabric of high-tenacity man-made yarn, tracing cloth; canvas prepared for use by painters, buckram and similar stiffened textile fabrics, fabrics coated with gum or amylaceous substances - manufacture of diverse textile articles: textile wicks, incandescent gas mantles and tubular gas mantle fabric, hosepiping, transmission or conveyor belts or belting, bolting cloth, straining cloth

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of needleloom felt floor coverings, see 17.51 - manufacture of cloth of woven metal wire, see 28.73

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of knitted and crocheted fabrics
Manufacture of knitted and crocheted fabrics

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture and processing in the same unit of knitted or crocheted fabrics: • pile and terry fabrics • net and window furnishing type fabrics knitted on Raschel or similar machines • other knitted or crocheted fabrics

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of net and window furnishing type fabrics of lace knitted on Raschel or similar machines, see 17.54

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of knitted and crocheted articles
Manufacture of knitted and crocheted hosiery

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of hosiery, including socks, tights and panty hose

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of knitted and crocheted pullovers, cardigans and similar articles

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of knitted or crocheted pullovers, cardigans, jerseys, waistcoats and similar articles

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of wearing apparel; dressing and dyeing of fur

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of wearing apparel made of leather or imitation leather

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of leather gloves and belts, see 18.24 - manufacture of leather sports gloves and sports headgear, see 36.40

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of other wearing apparel and accessories

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of workwear

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of footwear, see 19.30 - manufacture of wearing apparel of rubber or plastics not assembled by stitching but merely sealed together, see 25.13, 25.24 - manufacture of safety headgear, see 25.24, 28.75 - repair of wearing apparel, see 52.74

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of other outerwear made of woven, knitted or crocheted fabric, non-wovens, etc. for men, women and children: • coats, suits, ensembles, jackets, trousers, skirts, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - custom tailoring

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of wearing apparel of furskins, see 18.30 - manufacture of wearing apparel of rubber or plastics not assembled by stitching but merely sealed together, see 25.13, 25.24 - repair of wearing apparel, see 52.74

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of underwear made of woven, knitted or crocheted fabric, lace, etc. for men, women and children: • shirts, T-shirts, underpants, briefs, pyjamas, nightdresses, dressing gowns, blouses, slips, brassieres, corsets, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - repair of wearing apparel, see 52.74

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of other wearing apparel and accessories n.e.c.

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of babies garments, tracksuits, skisuits, swimwear, etc. - manufacture of hats and caps - manufacture of other clothing accessories: gloves, belts, shawls, ties, cravats, hairnets, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of headgear of furskins - manufacture of footwear of textile material without applied soles

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of safety headgear, see 25.24, 28.75 - manufacture of leather sports gloves and sports headgear, see 36.40 - repair of wearing apparel, see 52.74

Label.LabelText: Dressing and dyeing of fur; manufacture of articles of fur
Dressing and dyeing of fur; manufacture of articles of fur

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - dressing and dyeing of furskins and hides with the hair on: scraping, currying, tanning, bleaching, shearing and plucking and dyeing of furskins - manufacture of articles made of furskins: • fur wearing apparel and clothing accessories • assemblies of furskins such as 'dropped' furskins, plates, mats, strips, etc. • diverse articles of furskins: rugs, unstuffed pouffes, industrial polishing cloths

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of artificial fur and articles thereof

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - production of raw furskins, see 01.25, 01.50 - production of raw hides and skins, see 15.11 - manufacture of imitation furs (long hair cloth obtained by weaving or knitting), see 17.2, 17.60 - manufacture of fur hats, see 18.24 - manufacture of apparel trimmed with fur, see 18.24 - manufacture of boots or shoes containing fur parts, see 19.30

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of leather and leather products
Tanning and dressing of leather; manufacture of luggage, handbags, saddlery, harness and footwear

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - production of tanned leather - manufacture of chamois dressed, parchment dressed, patent or metallized leathers - manufacture of composition leather

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - production of raw hides and skins, see 15.11 - manufacture of leather apparel, see 18.10 - tanning or dressing of furskins or hides with the hair on, see 18.30 - manufacture of imitation leather not based on natural leather, see 17.2, 25.13, 25.24

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of luggage, handbags and the like, saddlery and harness
Manufacture of luggage, handbags and the like, saddlery and harness

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of luggage, handbags and the like, of leather, composition leather and of any other material, such as plastic sheeting, textile materials, vulcanized fibre or paperboard, where the same technology is used as for leather - manufacture of non-metallic watch straps - manufacture of diverse articles of leather or composition leather: driving belts, packings, etc. - manufacture of saddlery and harness

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of leather wearing apparel, see 18.10 - manufacture of leather gloves and hats, see 18.24 - manufacture of footwear, see 19.30 - manufacture of metallic watch straps, see 33.50

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of footwear for all purposes, of any material, by any process, including moulding - manufacture of gaiters, leggings and similar articles - manufacture of parts of footwear: manufacture of uppers and parts of uppers, outer and inner soles, heels, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of footwear of textile material without applied soles, see 18.24 - manufacture of footwear of asbestos, see 26.82 - manufacture of orthopaedic shoes, see 33.10

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of wood and wood products
Manufacture of wood and of products of wood and cork, except furniture; manufacture of articles of straw and plaiting materials
Sawmilling and planing of wood; impregnation of wood
Sawmilling and planing of wood; impregnation of wood

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - sawing, planing and machining of wood - manufacture of wooden railway sleepers - manufacture of unassembled wooden flooring - manufacture of wood wool, wood flour, chips, particles

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - drying of wood - impregnation or chemical treatment of wood with preservatives or other materials

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - logging and production of wood in the rough, see 02.01 - manufacture of shingles and shakes, beadings and mouldings, see 20.30

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of veneer sheets; manufacture of plywood, laminboard, particle board, fibre board and other panels and boards
Manufacture of veneer sheets; manufacture of plywood, laminboard, particle board, fibre board and other panels and boards
Manufacture of builders' carpentry and joinery
Manufacture of builders' carpentry and joinery

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of wooden goods intended to be used primarily in the construction industry: • beams, rafters, roof struts • doors, windows, shutters and their frames • stairs, railings • wooden beadings and mouldings, shingles and shakes • parquet floor blocks, strips, etc., assembled into panels - manufacture of prefabricated buildings, or elements thereof, of wood

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of unassembled wooden flooring, see 20.10

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of packing cases, boxes, crates, drums and similar packings of wood - manufacture of pallets, box pallets and other load boards of wood - manufacture of barrels, vats, tubs and other coopers' products of wood - manufacture of wooden cable-drums

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of luggage, see 19.20 - manufacture of cases of plaiting material, see 20.52

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of other products of wood; manufacture of articles of cork, straw and plaiting materials
Manufacture of other products of wood

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of various wood products: • wooden handles and bodies for tools, brooms, brushes • wooden boot or shoe lasts and trees, clothes hangers • household utensils and kitchenware of wood; coat and hat racks • wooden statuettes and ornaments, wood marquetry, inlaid wood • wooden caskets and cases for jewellery, cutlery and similar articles • wooden spools, cops, bobbins, sewing thread reels and similar articles of turned wood • other articles of wood

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of luggage, see 19.20 - manufacture of wooden footwear, see 19.30 - manufacture of lamps and lighting fittings, see 31.50 - manufacture of clock cases, see 33.50 - manufacture of furniture, see 36.1 - manufacture of wooden toys, see 36.50 - manufacture of imitation jewellery, see 36.61 - manufacture of brushes and brooms, see 36.62 - manufacture of walking sticks and umbrella handles, see 36.63 - manufacture of matches, see 36.63

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of articles of cork, straw and plaiting materials

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - natural cork processing - manufacture of articles of natural or agglomerated cork - manufacture of plaits and products of plaiting materials: mats, matting, screens, etc. - manufacture of basketware and wickerwork

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of mats or matting of textile materials, see 17.51 - manufacture of furniture, see 36.1

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of pulp, paper and paper products; publishing and printing
Manufacture of pulp, paper and paper products
Manufacture of pulp, paper and paperboard

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of bleached, semi-bleached or unbleached paper pulp by mechanical, chemical (dissolving or non-dissolving) or semi-chemical processes - removal of ink and manufacture of pulp from waste paper

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of paper and paperboard intended for further industrial processing

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - coating, covering and impregnation of paper and paperboard - manufacture of creped or crinkled paper - manufacture of newsprint and other printing or writing paper - manufacture of cellulose wadding and webs of cellulose fibres

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of corrugated paperboard, see 21.21 - manufacture of further processed articles of paper, see 21.22, 21.23, 21.24, 21.25

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of articles of paper and paperboard
Manufacture of corrugated paper and paperboard and of containers of paper and paperboard

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of corrugated paper and paperboard - manufacture of containers of corrugated paper or paperboard - manufacture of folding paperboard containers - manufacture of containers of solid board - manufacture of other containers of paper and paperboard - manufacture of sacks and bags of paper - manufacture of office box files and similar articles

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of envelopes, see 21.23

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of household and sanitary goods and of toilet requisites

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of household and personal hygiene paper and cellulose wadding products: • cleansing tissues • handkerchiefs, towels, serviettes • toilet paper • sanitary towels and tampons, napkins and napkin liners for babies • cups, dishes and trays

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of printing and writing paper ready for use - manufacture of computer printout paper - manufacture of self-copy paper ready for use - manufacture of duplicator stencils and carbon paper ready for use - manufacture of gummed or adhesive paper ready for use - manufacture of envelopes and letter-cards - manufacture of boxes, pouches, wallets and writing compendiums containing an assortment of paper stationery

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of wallpaper and similar wallcoverings, including vinyl coated wallpaper - manufacture of textile wall coverings

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of other articles of paper and paperboard n.e.c.

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of labels - manufacture of filter paper and paperboard - manufacture of paper and paperboard bobbins, spools, cops, etc. - manufacture of eggtrays and other moulded pulp packaging products, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of paper or paperboard in bulk, see 21.12 - manufacture of playing cards, see 36.50 - manufacture of games and toys of paper or paperboard, see 36.50

Label.LabelText: Publishing, printing and reproduction of recorded media

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - publishing of books, brochures, leaflets and similar publications, including publishing of dictionaries and encyclopaedias - publishing of maps and charts - publishing of printed music

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - publishing of newspapers, including advertising newspapers

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - publishing of gramophone records, compact discs and tapes with music or other sound recordings

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - publishing of: • photos, engravings and postcards • timetables • forms • posters, reproduction of works of art • other printed matter such as postcards reproduced by mechanical or photo-mechanical means

Label.LabelText: Printing and service activities related to printing

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - printing of magazines and other periodicals, books and brochures, music and music manuscripts, maps, atlases, posters, advertising catalogues, prospectuses and other printed advertising, postage stamps, taxation stamps, documents of title, cheques and other security papers, registers, albums, diaries, calendars, business forms and other commercial printed matter, personal stationery and other printed matter by letterpress, offset, photogravure, flexographic, screen printing and other printing presses, duplication machines, computer printers, embossers, photocopiers and thermocopiers

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - printing of labels, see 21.25 - publishing, see 22.1

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - finishing of printed sheets, e.g. into books, brochures, magazines, catalogues, etc., by folding, assembling, stitching, glueing, collating, basting, adhesive binding, trimming, gold stamping - finishing of printed paper or board, e.g. for business forms, displays, sample cards, labels, calendars, advertising literature for mailing, prospectuses, by folding, stamping, drilling, punching, perforating, embossing, sticking, glueing, laminating

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - composing, e.g. text and image on film, photographic paper and normal paper - reproduction: production of letterpress printing forms (e.g. flexographic or rubber plates, plastic plates, nylon printing plates, zinc or photopolymer plates, stereos and electros, embossing matrices), offset reproduction and printing plates (e.g. offset lithos, offset plates such as mono or multimetal plates, screen printing stencils, film assemblers), gravure reproductions and gravure cylinders (e.g. half-tone copies and scanner films for cylinder engraving)

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - production of other reprographic products: overhead projection foils, sketches, layouts, dummies, etc. - preparation of digital data, e.g. enhancement, selection, linkage of digital data stored on EDP data carriers - other graphic activities

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - reproduction from master copies of gramophone records, compact discs and tapes with music or other sound recordings

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - reproduction from master copies of records, compact discs and tapes with motion pictures and other video recordings

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - reproduction from master copies of software and data on discs and tapes

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of coke, refined petroleum products and nuclear fuel
Manufacture of coke, refined petroleum products and nuclear fuel

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - production of coke - production of coke oven gas - production of crude coal and lignite tars

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - agglomeration of hard coal, see 10.10 - agglomeration of lignite, see 10.20 - production of pitch and pitch coke, see 24.14

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - production of motor fuel: gasolene, kerosene, etc. - production of fuel: light, medium and heavy fuel oil, refinery gases such as ethane propane, butane, etc. - manufacture of oil based lubricating oils or greases, including from waste oil - manufacture of products for the petrochemical industry and for the manufacture of road coverings - manufacture of various products: white spirit, Vaseline, paraffin, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - production of enriched uranium - production of fuel elements for nuclear reactors - production of radioactive elements for industrial or medical use - treatment of nuclear waste

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - mining and concentration of uranium and thorium ores, see 12.00 - manufacture of yellowcake, see 12.00

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of chemicals, chemical products and man-made fibres
Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of liquefied or compressed industrial or medical gases: • elemental gases • liquid or compressed air • refrigerant gases • mixed industrial gases • inert gases such as carbon dioxide • isolating gases

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - extraction of methane, ethane, butane or propane, see 11.10 - manufacture of fuel gases such as ethane, butane or propane in a petroleum refinery, see 23.20

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of dyes and pigments from any source in basic form or as concentrate

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of products of a kind used as fluorescent brightening agents or as luminophores

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of prepared dyes and pigments, see 24.30

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of other inorganic basic chemicals

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of chemical elements except metals, industrial elemental gases and radioactive elements produced by the nuclear fuels industry - manufacture of inorganic acids except nitric acid - manufacture of alkalis, lyes and other inorganic bases except ammonia - manufacture of other inorganic compounds

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of nitric and sulphonitric acids, see 24.15 - manufacture of ammonia, see 24.15 - manufacture of ammonia chloride, see 24.15 - manufacture of nitrites and nitrates of potassium, see 24.15 - manufacture of phosphates of triammoniun, ammonium carbonates, see 24.15

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of other organic basic chemicals

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of other organic basic chemicals: • acyclic hydrocarbons, saturated and unsaturated • cyclic hydrocarbons, saturated and unsaturated • acyclic and cyclic alcohols, including synthetic ethyl alcohol • mono- and polycarboxylic acids, including acetic acid • other oxygen-function compounds, including aldehydes, ketones, quinones and dual or poly oxygen-function compounds • nitrogen-function organic compounds, including amines • other organic compounds, including wood distillation products, etc. - manufacture of charcoal - production of pitch and pitch coke - manufacture of synthetic aromatic products - distillation of coal tar

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of ethyl alcohol from fermented materials, see 15.92 - manufacture of plastics in primary forms, see 24.16 - manufacture of synthetic rubber in primary forms, see 24.17 - manufacture of salicylic and O-acetylsalicylic acids, see 24.41 - manufacture of crude glycerol, see 24.51 - manufacture of essential oils, see 24.63

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of fertilizers and nitrogen compounds

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of fertilizers: • straight or complex nitrogenous, phosphatic or potassic fertilizers • urea, crude natural phosphates and crude natural potassium salts - manufacture of associated nitrogen products: • nitric and sulphonitric acids, ammonia, ammonium chloride, nitrites and nitrates of potassium, phosphates of triammonium and ammonium carbonates

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - mining of guano, see 14.30 - manufacture of agrochemical products, see 24.20

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of plastics in primary forms

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of plastics in primary forms: • polymers, including those of ethylene, propylene, styrene, vinyl chloride, vinyl acetate and acrylics • polyamides • phenolic and epoxide resins and polyurethanes • alkyd and polyester resins and polyethers • silicones • ion-exchangers based on polymers

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of cellulose

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - recycling of plastics, see 37.20

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of synthetic rubber in primary forms

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of synthetic rubber in primary forms: • synthetic rubber • factice - manufacture of mixtures of synthetic rubber and natural rubber or rubber-like gums (e.g. balata)

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of pesticides and other agro-chemical products
Manufacture of pesticides and other agro-chemical products

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of insecticides, rodenticides, fungicides, herbicides, anti-sprouting products, plant growth regulators, disinfectants and other agro-chemical products n.e.c.

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, see 24.15

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of paints, varnishes and similar coatings, printing ink and mastics
Manufacture of paints, varnishes and similar coatings, printing ink and mastics

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of paints and varnishes, enamels or lacquers - manufacture of prepared pigments, opacifiers and colours; manufacture of vitrifiable enamels and glazes and engobes and similar preparations - manufacture of mastics - manufacture of caulking compounds and similar non-refractory filling or surfacing preparations - manufacture of organic composite solvents and thinners, manufacture of prepared paint or varnish removers - manufacture of printing ink

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of dyestuffs and pigments, see 24.12 - manufacture of writing and drawing ink, see 24.66

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of pharmaceuticals, medicinal chemicals and botanical products

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - investigation, perfecting and production of medicinal active substances to be used for their pharmacological properties in the manufacture of medicaments - processing of blood

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of chemically pure sugars - processing of glands and manufacture of extracts of glands, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of medicaments defined as such in Community law: • antisera and other blood fractions • vaccines • diverse medicaments, including homeopathic preparations - manufacture of chemical contraceptive products for external use and hormonal contraceptive medicaments - manufacture of dental fillings and bone reconstruction cements

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of medical impregnated wadding, gauze, bandages, dressings, surgical gut string, etc.

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of soap and detergents, cleaning and polishing preparations, perfumes and toilet preparations
Manufacture of soap and detergents, cleaning and polishing preparations

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of organic surface-active agents - manufacture of soap - manufacture of glycerol - manufacture of surface-active preparations: • washing powders in solid or liquid form and detergents • dish-washing preparations • textile softeners - manufacture of cleaning and polishing products: • preparations for perfuming or deodorizing rooms • artificial waxes and prepared waxes • polishes and creams for leather • polishes and creams for wood • polishes for coachwork, glass and metal • scouring pastes and powders

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of perfumes and toilet preparations

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of perfumes and toilet preparations: • perfumes and toilet water • beauty and make-up preparations • sunburn prevention and sun tan preparations • manicure and pedicure preparations • shampoos, hair lacquers, waving and straightening preparations • dentifrices and preparations for oral hygiene, including denture fixative preparations • shaving preparations • deodorants and bath salts • depilatories

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - extraction and refining of essential oils, see 24.63

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of propellant powders - manufacture of explosives - manufacture of pyrotechnic products

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of gelatine and its derivatives, glues and prepared adhesives, including rubber based glues and adhesives

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of extracts of natural aromatic products - manufacture of resinoids - manufacture of aromatic distilled waters - manufacture of mixtures of odoriferous products for the manufacture of perfumes or food

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of synthetic aromatic products, see 24.14 - manufacture of perfumes and toilet preparations, see 24.52

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of photographic plates, films, sensitized paper and other sensitized unexposed materials - manufacture of chemical preparations for photographic uses

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of unrecorded media for sound or video recording - manufacture of unrecorded computer discs and tapes

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of other chemical products n.e.c.

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of various chemical products: • peptones, peptone derivatives, other protein substances and their derivatives n.e.c. • chemically modified oils and fats • materials used in the finishing of textiles and leather • powders and pastes used in soldering, brazing or welding • substances used to pickle metal • prepared additives for cements • activated carbon, lubricating oil additives, prepared rubber accelerators, catalysts and other chemical products for industrial use • antiknock preparations, antifreeze preparations, liquids for hydraulic transmission • composite diagnostic or laboratory reagents

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of writing and drawing ink

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of artificial or synthetic filament tow - manufacture of synthetic or artificial staple fibres, not carded, combed, or otherwise processed for spinning - manufacture of synthetic or artificial single yarn, including high tenacity yarn - manufacture of synthetic or artificial monofilament or strip

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of sewing thread of man-made filaments, see 17.16 - spinning of synthetic or artificial fibres, see 17.1

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of rubber and plastic products
Manufacture of rubber and plastic products
Manufacture of rubber tyres and tubes

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of rubber tyres for vehicles, equipment, mobile machinery and other uses: • pneumatic tyres • solid or cushion tyres - manufacture of inner tubes for tyres - manufacture of interchangeable tyre treads, tyre flaps, 'camel-back' strips for retreading tyres, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of rubber repair materials, see 25.13 - tyre and tube repair, fitting or replacement, see 50.20

Label.LabelText: Retreading and rebuilding of rubber tyres

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - tyre rebuilding and retreading

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of rubber repair materials, see 25.13 - repair of punctured tyres, see 50.20

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of other products of natural or synthetic rubber, unvulcanized, vulcanized or hardened: • rubber plates, sheets, strip, rods, profile shapes • tubes, pipes and hoses • rubber conveyor or transmission belts or belting • rubber hygienic articles: sheath contraceptives, teats, hot water bottles, etc. • rubber articles of apparel • rubber floor coverings • rubberized textiles • rubber thread and rope • rubberized yarn and fabrics • rubber rings, fittings and seals • rubber roller coverings • inflatable rubber mattresses

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of rubber repair materials

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of tyre cord fabrics, see 17.54 - manufacture of apparel of elastic fabrics, see 18.2 - manufacture of rubber footwear, see 19.30 - manufacture of glues and adhesives based on rubber, see 24.62 - manufacture of 'camel-back' strips, see 25.11 - manufacture of inflatable rafts and boats, see 35.12 - manufacture of mattresses of uncovered cellular rubber, see 36.15 - manufacture of rubber sports requisites, see 36.40 - manufacture of rubber games and toys, see 36.50 - reclaiming of rubber, see 37.20

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of plastic plates, sheets, tubes and profiles

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of semi-manufactures of plastic products: • plastic plates, sheets, blocks, film, foil, strip, etc. - manufacture of finished plastic products: • plastic tubes, pipes and hoses; hose and pipe fittings

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of plastics in primary forms, see 24.16 - manufacture of plastic optical elements, see 33.40 - manufacture of mattresses of uncovered cellular plastic, see 36.15

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of plastic articles for the packing of goods: • plastic bags, sacks, containers, boxes, cases, carboys, bottles, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of plastic travel goods, see 19.20 - manufacture of articles of synthetic or natural rubber, see 25.1 - packaging, see 74.82

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of builders' ware of plastic

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of builders' ware of plastic: • plastic doors, windows, frames, shutters, blinds, skirting boards • tanks, reservoirs • plastic floor, wall or ceiling coverings in rolls or in the form of tiles, etc. • plastic sanitary ware: • plastic baths, shower-baths, wash basins, lavatory pans, flushing cisterns, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of articles of synthetic or natural rubber, see 25.1 - manufacture of linoleum and hard non-plastic surface floor coverings, see 36.63

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of plastic tableware, kitchenware and toilet articles - manufacture of diverse plastic products: • plastic headgear, insulating fittings, parts of lighting fittings, office or school supplies, articles of apparel, fittings for furniture, statuettes, transmission and conveyer belts, etc.
