PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - mechanical crushing of metal waste such as used cars, washing machines, bikes, etc. with subsequent sorting and separation - mechanical reduction of large iron pieces such as railway wagons - stripping of used goods such as cars in order to obtain reusable parts - stripping of used goods such as cars or refrigerators to eliminate harmful waste (oil, cooling liquid, fuel, etc.)

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - manufacture of new products from secondary raw material, see 27 to 36 - wholesale in waste and scrap, including collecting, sorting, packing, dealing, etc. without an industrial process, see 51.57 - wholesale or retail sale trade in second-hand goods, see 51, 52.50

Label.LabelText: Recycling of non-metal waste and scrap
Recycling of non-metal waste and scrap

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - processing of non-metal waste and scrap and of non-metal articles, whether or not used, into secondary raw material. Typical is that, in terms of commodities, input consists of waste and scrap, the input being sorted or unsorted but always unfit for further direct use in an industrial process whereas the output is made fit for further processing and is to be considered then as an intermediate good. A process is required, either mechanical or chemical

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - reclaiming of rubber such as used tires to produce secondary raw material - sorting and pelleting of plastics to produce secondary raw material for tubes, flower pots, pallets and the like - reclaiming of chemicals from chemical waste - crushing, cleaning and sorting of glass - crushing, cleaning and sorting of other waste such as demolition waste to obtain secondary raw materials

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - production of new products from secondary raw material such as spinning of yarn from garnetted stock or making pulp from waste paper or retreading tyres should be classified in the appropriate class of manufacturing - treatment of food, beverages and tobacco waste, see 15, 16 - processing of depleted thorium or uranium, see 23.30 - wholesale in waste and scrap, including collecting, sorting, packing, dealing, etc. without an industrial process, see 51.57 - wholesale or retail sale trade in second-hand goods, see 51, 52.50

Label.LabelText: Electricity, gas, steam and hot water supply

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - generation of electricity by all means, including thermal, nuclear, hydroelectric, gas turbine, diesel and renewables - transmission, distribution and supply of electricity

Label.LabelText: Manufacture of gas; distribution of gaseous fuels through mains
Manufacture of gas; distribution of gaseous fuels through mains

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - transportation, distribution and supply of gaseous fuels of all kinds through a system of mains - manufacture of gaseous fuels with a specified calorific value, by purification, blending and other processes from gases of various types - production of gas for the purpose of gas supply by carbonation of coal, from by-products of agriculture or from waste

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - operation of coke ovens, see 23.10 - manufacture of refined petroleum products, see 23.20 - manufacture of industrial gases, see 24.11 - transportation of gases by pipelines (other than mains), see 60.30

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - production, collection and distribution of steam and hot water for heating, power and other purposes

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - production and distribution of chilled water or ice for cooling purposes

Label.LabelText: Collection, purification and distribution of water
Collection, purification and distribution of water
Collection, purification and distribution of water

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - desalting of sea water to produce water as the principal product of interest

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - irrigation system operation for agricultural purposes, see 01.41 - treatment of waste water solely in order to prevent pollution, see 90.00

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - new construction, restoration and ordinary repair

Label.LabelText: Demolition and wrecking of buildings; earth moving

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - demolition or wrecking of buildings and other structures - clearing of building sites - earth moving: excavation, landfill, levelling and grading of construction sites, trench digging, rock removal, blasting, etc. - site preparation for mining: • overburden removal and other development and preparation of mineral properties and sites

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - building site drainage - drainage of agricultural or forestry land

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - test drilling, test boring and core sampling for construction, geophysical, geological or similar purposes

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - drilling of production oil or gas wells, see 11.20 - water well drilling, see 45.25 - shaft sinking, see 45.25 - oil and gas field exploration, geophysical, geological and seismic surveying, see 74.20

Label.LabelText: Building of complete constructions or parts thereof; civil engineering
General construction of buildings and civil engineering works

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - construction of all types of buildings - construction of civil engineering constructions: • bridges, including those for elevated highways, viaducts, tunnels and subways • long-distance pipelines, communication and power lines • urban pipelines, urban communication and powerlines; ancillary urban works - assembly and erection of prefabricated constructions on the site

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - service activities incidental to oil and gas extraction, see 11.20 - erection of complete prefabricated constructions from self-manufactured parts not of concrete, see divisions 20, 26 and 28 - construction work, other than buildings, for stadiums, swimming pools, gymnasiums, tennis courts, golf courses and other sports installations, see 45.23 - building installation, see 45.3 - building completion, see 45.4 - architectural and engineering activities, see 74.20 - project management for construction, see 74.20

Label.LabelText: Erection of roof covering and frames

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - erection of roofs - roof covering - waterproofing

Label.LabelText: Construction of highways, roads, airfields and sport facilities

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - construction of highways, streets, roads, other vehicular and pedestrian ways - construction of railways - construction of airfield runways - construction work, other than buildings, for stadiums, swimming pools, gymnasiums, tennis courts, golf courses and other sports installations - painting of markings on road surfaces and car parks

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - preliminary earth moving, see 45.11

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - construction of: • waterways, harbour and river works, pleasure ports (marinas), locks, etc. • dams and dykes - dredging - subsurface work

Label.LabelText: Other construction work involving special trades

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - construction activities specializing in one aspect common to different kind of structures, requiring specialized skill or equipment: • construction of foundations, including pile driving • water well drilling and construction, shaft sinking • erection of non-self-manufactured steel elements • steel bending • bricklaying and stone setting • scaffolds and work platform erecting and dismantling, including renting of scaffolds and work platforms • erection of chimneys and industrial ovens

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - renting of scaffolds without erection and dismantling, see 71.32

Label.LabelText: Installation of electrical wiring and fittings

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - installation in buildings or other construction projects of: • electrical wiring and fittings • telecommunications systems • electrical heating systems • residential antennas and aerials • fire alarms • burglar alarm systems • lifts and escalators • lightning conductors, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - installation in buildings or other construction projects of thermal, sound or vibration insulation

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - waterproofing, see 45.22

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - installation in buildings or other construction projects of: • plumbing and sanitary equipment • gas fittings • heating, ventilation, refrigeration or air-conditioning equipment and ducts • sprinkler systems

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - installation of electrical heating systems, see 45.31

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - installation of illumination and signalling systems for roads, railways, airports and harbours - installation in buildings or other construction projects of fittings and fixtures n.e.c.

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - application in buildings or other construction projects of interior and exterior plaster or stucco, including related lathing materials

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - installation of not self-manufactured doors, windows, door and window frames, fitted kitchens, staircases, shop fittings and the like, of wood or other materials - interior completion such as ceilings, wooden wall coverings, movable partitions, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - laying of parquet and other wood floor coverings, see 45.43

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - laying, tiling, hanging or fitting in buildings or other construction projects of: • ceramic, concrete or cut stone wall or floor tiles • parquet and other wood floor coverings • carpets and linoleum floor coverings, including of rubber or plastic • terrazzo, marble, granite or slate floor or wall coverings • wallpaper

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - interior and exterior painting of buildings - painting of civil engineering structures - installation of glass, mirrors, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - installation of windows, see 45.42

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - installation of private swimming pools - steam cleaning, sand blasting and similar activities for building exteriors - other building completion and finishing work n.e.c.

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - interior cleaning of buildings and other structures, see 74.70

Label.LabelText: Renting of construction or demolition equipment with operator
Renting of construction or demolition equipment with operator

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - renting of construction or demolition machinery and equipment without operators, see 71.32

Label.LabelText: Wholesale and retail trade; repair of motor vehicles, motorcycles and personal and household goods
Wholesale and retail trade; repair of motor vehicles, motorcycles and personal and household goods
Sale, maintenance and repair of motor vehicles and motorcycles; retail sale of automotive fuel

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - all activities (except manufacture and renting) related to motor vehicles and motorcycles, including lorries and trucks: • wholesale and retail sale of new and second-hand vehicles • maintenance and repair • wholesale and retail sale of parts and accessories • activities of commission agents involved in wholesale or retail sale of vehicles • washing, polishing and towing of vehicles, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - retail sale of automotive fuel and lubricating or cooling products

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - renting of motor vehicles, see 71.10 - renting of motorcycles, see 71.21

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - wholesale and retail sale of new and used vehicles: • passenger motor vehicles, including specialized passenger motor vehicles such as ambulances and minibuses, etc. • lorries, trailers and semi-trailers • camping vehicles such as caravans and motorhomes

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - wholesale and retail sale of off-road motor vehicles (jeeps, etc.) - wholesale and retail sale by commission agents

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - wholesale and retail sale of parts and accessories for motor vehicles, see 50.30

Label.LabelText: Maintenance and repair of motor vehicles
Maintenance and repair of motor vehicles

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - maintenance and repair of motor vehicles: • mechanical repairs • electrical repairs • ordinary servicing • bodywork repair • repair of motor vehicle parts • washing, polishing, etc. • spraying and painting • repair of screens and windows - tyre and tube repair, fitting or replacement - antirust-treatment - towing - installation of parts and accessories - roadside assistance

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - retreading and rebuilding of tyres, see 25.12

Label.LabelText: Sale of motor vehicle parts and accessories
Sale of motor vehicle parts and accessories
Sale, maintenance and repair of motorcycles and related parts and accessories
Sale, maintenance and repair of motorcycles and related parts and accessories

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - wholesale and retail sale of motorcycles, including mopeds - wholesale and retail sale of parts and accessories for motorcycles - activities of commission agents - maintenance and repair of motorcycles

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - sale, maintenance and repair of bicycles and related parts and accessories, see 51.18, 51.47, 52.48, 52.74

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - retail sale of fuel for motor vehicles and motorcycles

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - retail sale of lubricating products and cooling products for motor vehicles

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - wholesale of fuels, see 51.51

Label.LabelText: Wholesale trade and commission trade, except of motor vehicles and motorcycles

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - resale (sale without transformation) of new and used goods to retailers, to industrial, commercial, institutional or professional users; or to other wholesalers; or acting as agents in buying merchandise for, or selling merchandise to, such persons or companies: • activities of wholesale merchants, jobbers, industrial distributors, exporters, importers, cooperative buying associations, merchandise and commodity brokers, commission merchants and agents and assemblers, buyers and cooperative associations engaged in the marketing of farm products

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - the usual manipulations involved in wholesale such as assembling, sorting and grading of goods in large lots, break bulks, repacking and bottling, redistribution in smaller lots, e.g. pharmaceuticals; storage, refrigeration, delivery and installation of goods on own account

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - wholesale of motor vehicles, caravans and motorcycles, see 50.10, 50.40 - wholesale of motor accessories, see 50.30, 50.40 - renting and leasing of goods, see 71

Label.LabelText: Wholesale on a fee or contract basis

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - activities of commission agents, commodity brokers and all other wholesalers who trade on behalf and on the account of others - activities of those involved in bringing sellers and buyers together or undertaking commercial transactions on behalf of a principal

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - wholesale trade in own name, see 51.2 to 51.7 - retail sale by agents, see 52 - activities of insurance agencies, see 67.20 - activities of real estate agents, see 70.3

Agents involved in the sale of fuels, ores, metals and industrial chemicals
Agents involved in the sale of timber and building materials
Agents involved in the sale of machinery, industrial equipment, ships and aircraft

Agents involved in the sale of textiles, clothing, footwear and leather goods

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent

Agents specializing in the sale of particular products or ranges of products n.e.c.

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions

Wholesale of food, beverages and tobacco

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This group includes only wholesale on own account

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - wholesale of unprocessed fruit and vegetables, including potatoes

Label.LabelText: Wholesale of meat and meat products

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - wholesale of meat, poultrymeat, game meat, processed meat and meat products

Label.LabelText: Wholesale of dairy produce, eggs and edible oils and fats

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - wholesale of dairy produce - wholesale of eggs and egg products - wholesale of edible oils and fats of animal and vegetable origin

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - buying of wine in bulk and bottling without transformation - buying of wine in bulk with blending, purification, bottling and resale

Label.LabelText: Wholesale of sugar and chocolate and sugar confectionery
Wholesale of coffee, tea, cocoa and spices
Wholesale of other food, including fish, crustaceans and molluscs

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent

Label.LabelText: Non-specialized wholesale of food, beverages and tobacco

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This group includes only wholesale on own account

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - wholesale of yarn - wholesale of fabrics - wholesale of household linen, etc - wholesale of haberdashery: needles, sewing thread, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - wholesale of textile fibres, see 51.56

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - wholesale of clothing, including sports clothes - wholesale of clothing accessories such as gloves, ties and braces - wholesale of fur articles - wholesale of footwear

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - wholesale of jewellery and leather goods, see 51.47

Label.LabelText: Wholesale of electrical household appliances and radio and television goods

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - wholesale of gramophone records, tapes, CDs and videos - wholesale of lighting equipment - wholesale of wire and switches and other installation equipment for domestic use

Label.LabelText: Wholesale of china and glassware, wallpaper and cleaning materials

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - wholesale of instruments and devices for doctors and hospitals - wholesale of orthopaedic goods

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - wholesale of funiture, carpets and other floor coverings and non-electrical household appliances - wholesale of stationery, books, magazines and newspapers, photographic and optical goods, leather goods and travel accessories, watches, clocks and jewellery, musical instruments, games and toys, sports goods, bicycles and their parts and accessories, woodenware, wickerwork and corkware, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - wholesale of office furniture, see 51.64

Label.LabelText: Wholesale of non-agricultural intermediate products, waste and scrap

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This group includes only wholesale on own account

Label.LabelText: Wholesale of solid, liquid and gaseous fuels and related products

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - wholesale of automotive fuels, greases, lubricants, oils, etc.

Label.LabelText: Wholesale of metals and metal ores

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - wholesale of ferrous and non-ferrous metal ores - wholesale of ferrous and non-ferrous metals in primary forms - wholesale of ferrous and non-ferrous semi-finished metal products n.e.c - wholesale of gold and other precious metals

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - wholesale of waste and scrap, see 51.57 - dealing in gold bullion for financial purposes, see 65.23

Label.LabelText: Wholesale of wood, construction materials and sanitary equipment

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - wholesale of paint and varnish - wholesale of wood in the rough - wholesale of products of primary processing of wood - wholesale of construction materials: • sand, gravel - wholesale of flat glass - wholesale of sanitary equipment: • baths, washbasins, toilets and other sanitary porcelain

Label.LabelText: Wholesale of hardware, plumbing and heating equipment and supplies

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - wholesale of sanitary installation equipment: • tubes, pipes, fittings, taps, T-pieces, connections, rubber pipes, etc. - wholesale of tools such as hammers, saws, screwdrivers and other hand tools

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - wholesale of industrial chemicals: • aniline, printing ink, essential oils, industrial gases, chemical glues, colouring matter, synthetic resin, methanol, paraffin, scents and flavourings, soda, industrial salt, acids and sulphurs, starch derivates, etc. - wholesale of fertilizers and agrochemical products - wholesale of plastic materials in primary forms - wholesale of rubber

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - wholesale of textile fibres, etc. - wholesale of paper in bulk

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - wholesale of metal and non-metal waste and scrap and materials for recycling

Label.LabelText: Wholesale of machinery, equipment and supplies

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This group includes only wholesale on own account

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - wholesale of computer-controlled machine-tools

Label.LabelText: Wholesale of machinery for the textile industry and of sewing and knitting machines

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - wholesale of computer-controlled machinery for the textile industry and of computer-controlled sewing and knitting machines

Label.LabelText: Wholesale of office machinery and equipment

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - wholesale of computers and peripheral equipment - wholesale of other office machinery and equipment such as typewriters, adding machines - wholesale of office furniture, etc.

Label.LabelText: Wholesale of other machinery for use in industry, trade and navigation

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - wholesale of transport equipment except motor vehicles, motorcycles and bicycles - wholesale of production-line robots - wholesale of wires and switches and other installation equipment for industrial use - wholesale of other electrical material such as electrical motors, transformers as well as electronic components - wholesale of other machinery n.e.c. for use in industry, trade and navigation and other services

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - wholesale of measuring instruments and equipment

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - wholesale of motor vehicles, trailers and caravans, see 50.10 - wholesale of motor vehicle parts, see 50.30 - wholesale of motorcycles, see 50.40 - wholesale of bicycles, see 51.47

Label.LabelText: Wholesale of agricultural machinery and accessories and implements, including tractors

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - wholesale of lawnmowers however operated

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: This group includes only wholesale on own account

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - specialized wholesale not covered in one of the previous categories - wholesale of a variety of goods without any particular specialization

Label.LabelText: Retail trade, except of motor vehicles and motorcycles; repair of personal and household goods

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - resale (sale without transformation) of new and used goods to the general public for personal or household consumption or utilization, by shops, department stores, stalls, mail-order houses, hawkers and peddlers, consumer cooperatives, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - repair and installation of personal or household goods whether or not done in combination with retail sale - retail sale by commission agents

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - sale of motor vehicles, motorcycles and their parts and of fuel for these articles, see 50 - trade in cereals, grains, ores, crude petroleum, industrial chemicals, iron and steel and industrial machinery and equipment, see 51 - sale of food and drinks for consumption on the premises and sale of take-away food, see 55.30, 55.40, 55.51 - renting and hiring of personal and household goods to the general public, see 71.40

Label.LabelText: Retail sale in non-specialized stores with food, beverages or tobacco predominating

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - retail sale of a large variety of goods of which, however, food products, beverages or tobacco should be predominant: • activities of general stores which have, apart from their main sales of food products, beverages or tobacco, several other lines of merchandise such as wearing apparel, furniture, appliances, hardware, cosmetics, etc.

Label.LabelText: Other retail sale in non-specialized stores

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - retail sale of a large variety of goods of which food products, beverages or tobacco should not be predominant - activities of department stores carrying a general line of merchandise, including wearing apparel, furniture, appliances, hardware, cosmetics, jewellery, toys, sports goods, etc.

Label.LabelText: Retail sale of food, beverages and tobacco in specialized stores
Retail sale of fruit and vegetables

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - retail sale of preserved fruit and vegetables, see 52.27

Label.LabelText: Retail sale of meat and meat products

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - retail sale of poultry and game

Label.LabelText: Retail sale of fish, crustaceans and molluscs
Retail sale of bread, cakes, flour confectionery and sugar confectionery
Retail sale of alcoholic and other beverages
Other retail sale of food, beverages and tobacco in specialized stores

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - retail sale of dairy produce, eggs and edible oils and fats - retail sale of preserved fruit and vegetables

Label.LabelText: Retail sale of pharmaceutical and medical goods, cosmetic and toilet articles
Retail sale of medical and orthopaedic goods
Retail sale of cosmetic and toilet articles
Other retail sale of new goods in specialized stores

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - retail sale of fabrics - retail sale of knitting yarn - retail sale of basic materials for rug, tapestry or embroidery making - retail sale of household textiles such as sheets, tablecloths, towels - retail sale of haberdashery: needles, sewing thread, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - retail sale of articles of clothing - retail sale of articles of fur - retail sale of clothing accessories such as gloves, ties, braces, etc.

Label.LabelText: Retail sale of footwear and leather goods

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - retail sale of footwear - retail sale of leather goods - retail sale of travel accessories of leather and leather substitutes

Label.LabelText: Retail sale of furniture, lighting equipment and household articles n.e.c.

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - retail sale of furniture - retail sale of articles for lighting - retail sale of household utensils and cutlery, crockery, glassware, china and pottery - retail sale of curtains, net curtains and other household furnishing articles of textile materials - retail sale of wood, cork goods and wickerwork goods - retail sale of household articles and equipment n.e.c.

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - retail sale of cork floor tiles, see 52.48 - retail sale of antiques, see 52.50

Label.LabelText: Retail sale of electrical household appliances and radio and television goods

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - retail sale of household appliances - retail sale of radio and television goods and other household audio/visual equipment - retail sale of musical records and audio/visual tapes, CDs and cassettes - retail sale of musical instruments and scores

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - retail sale of non-electrical household appliances, see 52.44 - renting of tapes and records, see 71.40

Label.LabelText: Retail sale of hardware, paints and glass

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - retail sale of do-it-yourself material and equipment - retail sale of lawnmowers, however operated - retail sale of hardware - retail sale of paints, varnishes and lacquers - retail sale of flat glass - retail sale of other building material such as bricks, wood, sanitary equipment

Label.LabelText: Retail sale of books, newspapers and stationery

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - retail sale of office supplies such as pens, pencils, paper, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - retail sale of second-hand or antique books, see 52.50

Label.LabelText: Other retail sale in specialized stores

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - specialized retail sale of office equipment, computers and non-customized software - specialized retail sale of photographic, optical and precision equipment - specialized retail sale of wallpaper and floor coverings - specialized retail sale of watches, clocks and jewellery - specialized retail sale of sports goods, fishing gear, camping goods, boats and bicycles - specialized retail sale of games and toys - specialized retail sale of flowers, plants, seeds, fertilizers, pet animals and pet food - specialized retail sale of souvenirs, craftwork and religious articles - specialized retail sale of household fuel oil, bottled gas, coal and wood - specialized retail sale of weapons and ammunition - specialized retail sale of stamps and coins - specialized retail sale of non-food products n.e.c.

Label.LabelText: Retail sale of second-hand goods in stores
Retail sale of second-hand goods in stores

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - retail sale of second-hand books - retail sale of other second-hand goods - retail sale of antiques

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - retail sale of second-hand motor vehicles, see 50.10

Label.LabelText: Retail sale via mail order houses

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - retail sale of any kind of product by mail order. Goods are sent to the buyer, who made his choice on the basis of advertisements, catalogues, models or any other means of advertising

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - direct sale via television, radio and telephone

Label.LabelText: Retail sale via stalls and markets

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - retail sale of any kind of product in a usually movable stall either along a public road or on a fixed market place

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - retail sale of any kind of product in any way which is not included in previous classes: • by door-to-door sales persons • by vending machines, etc. • by mobile sellers

Label.LabelText: Repair of personal and household goods

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - repair of personal and household goods when not done in combination with manufacture, wholesale or retail sale of these goods. If done in combination the repair is included in the retailing, wholesaling or manufacturing activity

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - repair of motor vehicles and motorcycles, see 50

Label.LabelText: Repair of boots, shoes and other articles of leather

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - repair of boots, shoes, luggage and the like of other materials

Label.LabelText: Repair of watches, clocks and jewellery

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - repair of bicycles - repair and alteration of clothing

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - provision of short-stay lodging in: • hotels, motels and inns • hotels with conference facilities

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - rental of long-stay accommodation, see 70.20 - timeshare operations, see 70.20

Label.LabelText: Camping sites and other provision of short-stay accommodation

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - provision of short-stay lodging in: • holiday camps, chalets and flats • camping space and camping facilities • other short-stay lodging facilities such as guest houses, farmhouses, youth hostels, mountain refuges (shelters), etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - rental of long-stay accommodation, see 70.20

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - provision of short-stay lodging in: • holiday chalets, cottages and flats • other facilities n.e.c.

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - sale of meals for consumption generally on the premises, as well as sale of drinks accompanying the meals, possibly accompanied by some form of entertainment, by: • restaurants • self-service restaurants such as cafeterias • fast-food outlets such as burger bars • take-away restaurants • fish and chips stands and the like • ice cream parlours • dining car activities of railway companies and other passenger transport facilities

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - sale through vending machines, see 52.63

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - sale of drinks for consumption generally on the premises, possibly accompanied by some form of entertainment, by: • public houses, bars, nightclubs, beer halls, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: • sale through vending machines, see 52.63

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - sale of meals and drinks, usually at reduced prices to groups of clearly defined persons who are mostly linked by ties of a professional nature: • activities of sport, factory or office canteens • activities of school canteens and kitchens • activities of university dining halls • activities of messes and canteens for members of the armed forces, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - activities of contractors supplying meals prepared in a central food preparation unit for consumption on other premises such as the supply of prepared meals to: • airlines • 'meals on wheels' • banquets, corporate hospitality • weddings, parties and other celebrations or functions

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - activities related to providing passenger or freight transport, whether scheduled or not, by rail, pipeline, road, water or air - supporting activities such as terminal and parking facilities, cargo handling, storage, etc. - postal activities and telecommunication - renting of transport equipment with driver or operator

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - major repair or alteration of transport equipment, except motor vehicles, see 35 - construction, maintenance and repair of roads, railroads, harbours, airfields, see 45 - maintenance and repair of motor vehicles, see 50.20 - renting of transport equipment without driver or operator, see 71.1, 71.2

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - passenger and freight transport by interurban railways

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - passenger and freight terminal activities, cargo handling, storage and other auxiliary activities, see 63 - maintenance and minor repair of rolling stock, see 63.21

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - activities providing urban or suburban transport of passengers on scheduled routes following normally a fixed time schedule, picking up and setting down passengers at normally fixed stops. They may be carried out with motor bus, tramway, street car, trolley-bus, underground and elevated railways, etc. - activities providing interurban transport, except by rail, of passenger on scheduled routes following normally a fixed time schedule, picking up and setting down passengers at normally fixed stops

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - operation of school buses, town-to-airport or town-to-station lines, funicular railways, aerial cable-ways, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - other rental of private cars with operator

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - other non-scheduled passenger road transport: • charters, excursions and other occasional coach services

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - ambulance transport, see 85.14

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - freight transport operation by road: • logging haulage • stock haulage • refrigerated haulage • heavy haulage • bulk haulage, including haulage in tanker trucks • haulage of automobiles

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - furniture removal - renting of trucks with driver - freight transport by man or animal-drawn vehicles

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - operation of terminal facilities for handling freight, see 63

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - transport of gases, liquids, slurry and other commodities via pipelines - operation of pump stations

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - distribution of natural or manufactured gas, water or steam, see 40.20, 40.30, 41.00

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - transport of passengers or freight over water, whether scheduled or not - operation of excursion, cruise or sightseeing boats - operation of ferries, water taxis, etc. - transport by towing or pushing of barges, oil rigs, etc. - rental of ships and boats with crew

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - restaurant and bar activities on board ships, see 55.3, 55.4 - cargo handling, storage of freight, harbour operation and other auxiliary activities such as docking, pilotage, lighterage, vessel salvage, see 63

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - transport of passenger or freight via rivers, canals, lakes and other inland waterways, including inside harbours and docks

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - transport of passengers or freight by air or via space

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - crop spraying, see 01.41 - overhaul of aircraft or aircraft engines, see 35.30 - aerial advertising, see 74.40 - aerial photography, see 74.81

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - transport of passengers or freight by air over regular routes and on regular schedules

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - regular charter flights, see 62.20

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - non-scheduled transport of passengers or freight by air

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - regular charter flights

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - launching of satellites and space vehicles - space transport of physical goods and passengers

Label.LabelText: Supporting and auxiliary transport activities; activities of travel agencies

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - loading and unloading of goods or passengers' luggage irrespective of the mode of transport used for transportation - stevedoring

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - operation of terminal facilities, see 63.2

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - operation of storage and warehouse facilities for all kind of goods: • operation of grain silos, general merchandise warehouses, refrigerated warehouses, storage tanks, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - parking facilities for motor vehicles, see 63.21

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - activities related to land transport of passengers, animals or freight: • operation of terminal facilities such as railway stations, bus stations, stations for the handling of goods • operation of roads, bridges, tunnels, car parks or garages, bicycle parkings • winter storage of caravans

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - activities related to water transport of passengers, animals or freight: • operation of terminal facilities such as harbours and piers • operation of waterway locks, etc. • navigation, pilotage and berthing activities • lighterage, salvage activities • lighthouse activities

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - activities related to air transport of passengers, animals or freight: • operation of terminal facilities such as airway terminals, etc. • airport and air-traffic-control activities • ground service activities on airfields, etc. • activities of flying schools for commercial airline pilots

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - operation of flying schools, except for professional certificates, see 80.41

Label.LabelText: Activities of travel agencies and tour operators; tourist assistance activities n.e.c.
Activities of travel agencies and tour operators; tourist assistance activities n.e.c.

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - travel agency activities: • furnishing of travel information, advice and planning • arranging of made-to-measure tours, accommodation and transportation for travellers and tourists • furnishing of tickets, sale of packaged tours, etc. - activities of tour operators - activities of tourist guides

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - forwarding of freight - arranging or carrying-out of transport operations by road, sea or air - receipt of group and individual consignments (including pick-up of goods and grouping of consignments) - issue and procurement of transport documents and way-bills - organization of group consignments by road, rail, air or sea (including collection and distribution of goods) - activities of customs agents - activities of sea-freight forwarders and air-cargo agents - goods-handling operations, e.g. temporary crating for the sole purpose of protecting the goods during transit, uncrating, sampling, weighing of goods

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - courier activities, see 64.12 - activities related to the arrangement of freight insurance, see 67.20

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - pick-up, transport and delivery (domestic or international) of mail and parcels - collection of mail and parcels from public letter-boxes or from post offices - distribution and delivery of mail and parcels - mailbox rental, poste restante, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - postal giro and postal savings activities and other financial activities carried out by national postal administrations, see 65.12

Label.LabelText: Courier activities other than national post activities

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - picking-up, transport and delivery of letters and mail-type parcels and packages by firms other than national post. Either only one kind of transport or more than one mode of transport may be involved and the activity may be carried out with either self-owned (private) transport or via public transport

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - transmission of sound, images, data or other information via cables, broadcasting, relay or satellite: • telephone, telegraph and telex communication • maintenance of the network • transmission (transport) of radio and television programmes

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - telephone-answering activities, see 74.83 - production of radio and television programmes even if in connection with broadcast, see 92.20

Label.LabelText: Financial intermediation, except insurance and pension funding

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText:
- the activity of obtaining and redistributing funds other than for the purpose of insurance or pension funding or compulsory social security
- National institutional arrangements are likely to play a significant role in determining the classification of units within this division
- Credit-card activities are classified according to type of operator

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - the obtaining of funds in the form of transferable deposits

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - monetary intermediation of monetary institutions other than central banks

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - postal giro and postal savings bank activities

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - financial intermediation other than that conducted by monetary institutions

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - leasing where the term approximately covers the expected life of the asset and the lessee acquires substantially all the benefits of its use and takes all the risks associated with its ownership. The asset may or may not eventually be transferred

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - operational leasing, see 71, according to type of goods leased

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - other financial intermediation primarily concerned with distributing funds other than by making loans: • investment in securities, e.g. shares, bonds, bills, unit trust units, etc. • dealing for own account by securities dealers • investment in property where this is carried out primarily for other financial intermediaries (e.g. property unit trusts) • writing of swaps, options and other hedging arrangements

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - financial leasing, see 65.21 - security dealing on behalf of others, see 67.12 - trade, leasing and renting of property, see 70 - operational leasing, see 71

Label.LabelText: Insurance and pension funding, except compulsory social security
Insurance and pension funding, except compulsory social security

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - long- and short-term risk spreading with or without a savings element

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - life insurance and life reinsurance with or without a substantial savings element

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - the provision of retirement incomes

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - non-contributory schemes where the funding is largely derived from public sources, see 75.12 - compulsory social security schemes, see 75.30

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - insurance and reinsurance of non-life insurance business: • accident, fire • health • property • motor, marine, aviation, transport • pecuniary loss and liability insurance

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - provision of services involved in or closely related to financial intermediation, but not themselves involving financial intermediation

Label.LabelText: Activities auxiliary to financial intermediation, except insurance and pension funding

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - operation and supervision of financial markets other than by public authorities: • activities of stock exchanges, commodity exchanges, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - dealing in financial markets on behalf of others (e.g. stock-broking) and related activities

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - dealing in markets on own account, see 65.23

Label.LabelText: Activities auxiliary to financial intermediation n.e.c.

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - activities auxiliary to financial intermediation n.e.c.: • mortgage brokers • 'bureaux de change', etc.

Label.LabelText: Activities auxiliary to insurance and pension funding
Activities auxiliary to insurance and pension funding

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - activities involved in or closely related to insurance and pension funding other than financial intermediation: • activities of insurance agents • activities of insurance risk and damage evaluators

Label.LabelText: Real estate, renting and business activities
Real estate, renting and business activities
Real estate activities with own property
Development and selling of real estate

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - development of real estate projects: • bringing together financial, technical and physical means to realize real estate projects for later sale, whether for residential buildings or other

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - development and construction work of a real estate project by a construction unit, see 45.2

Label.LabelText: Buying and selling of own real estate

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - buying and selling of self-owned real estate: • apartment buildings and dwellings • non-residential buildings • land

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - letting and operating of self-owned real estate such as: • apartment buildings and dwellings • non-residential buildings, including exhibition halls • land

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - operation of hotels, rooming houses, camps, trailer camps and other non-residential or short-stay lodging places, see 55

Label.LabelText: Real estate activities on a fee or contract basis

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - intermediation in buying, selling, renting and appraising real estate

Label.LabelText: Management of real estate on a fee or contract basis

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - rent-collecting agencies

Label.LabelText: Renting of machinery and equipment without operator and of personal and household goods

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - operational leasing which is normally long-term rental

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - financial leasing which is normally a special form of credit granting, see 65.21

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - renting and operational leasing of self-drive private cars and light vans up to 3.5 tonnes

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - financial leasing, see 65.21

Label.LabelText: Renting of other land transport equipment

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - renting and operational leasing of land-transport equipment without drivers, except automobiles: • railroad vehicles • trucks, haulage tractors, trailers and semi-trailers • motorcycles, caravans and campers, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - renting of containers

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - renting or leasing of vehicles or trucks with driver, see 60.2 - financial leasing, see 65.21 - renting of bicycles, see 71.40

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - renting and operational leasing of water-transport equipment such as commercial boats and ships without operator

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - renting of water-transport equipment with operator, see 61 - financial leasing, see 65.21 - renting of pleasure boats, see 71.40

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - renting and operational leasing of air transport equipment without operator

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - renting of air-transport equipment with operator, see 62 - financial leasing, see 65.21

Label.LabelText: Renting of other machinery and equipment
Renting of agricultural machinery and equipment

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - renting and operational leasing of agricultural and forestry machinery and equipment without operator: • renting of products produced by group 29.3, such as agricultural tractors, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - renting of this machinery or equipment with operator, see 01.4 - financial leasing, see 65.21

Label.LabelText: Renting of construction and civil engineering machinery and equipment

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - renting and operational leasing of construction and civil-engineering machinery and equipment without operator - renting of scaffolds and work platforms without erection and dismantling

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - renting of this machinery or equipment with operator, see 45.50 - financial leasing, see 65.21

Label.LabelText: Renting of office machinery and equipment, including computers

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - renting and operational leasing of office machinery and equipment, including computers, without operator: • computing machinery and equipment • duplicating machines, typewriters and word-processing machines • accounting machinery and equipment

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - financial leasing, see 65.21

Label.LabelText: Renting of other machinery and equipment n.e.c.

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - renting and operational leasing of other machinery and equipment n.e.c., without operator: • engines and turbines, machine-tools • mining and oil-field equipment • professional radio, television and communication equipment • measuring and controlling equipment • other scientific, commercial and industrial machinery

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - financial leasing, see 65.21 - renting of agricultural machinery and equipment, see 71.31 - renting of construction and civil-engineering machinery and equipment, see 71.32 - renting of office machinery and equipment, including computers, see 71.33

Label.LabelText: Renting of personal and household goods n.e.c.
Renting of personal and household goods n.e.c.

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - the renting of other goods, to households or industries: • textiles, wearing apparel and footwear • furniture, pottery and glass, kitchen and tableware, electrical appliances and housewares • pleasure craft • bicycles • sports equipment • jewellery, musical instruments, scenery and costumes • books, journals and magazines • video tapes and records, etc. • do-it-yourself machinery and equipment • flowers and plants

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - renting of passenger cars and small vans, motorcycles, caravans and trailers, see 71.1, 71.2 - renting of books, journals, magazines, video tapes and records by libraries, see 92.51 - renting of linens, work uniforms, and related items by laundries, see 93.01

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - consultancy on type and configuration of hardware and associated software application: • analysing the users' needs and problems and presenting the best solution

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - hardware consultancy carried out by computer producing or selling units, see 30.02, 51.64, 52.48

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - analysis, design and programming of systems ready to use: • analysis of the user's needs and problems, consultancy on the best solution • development, production, supply and documentation of made-to-order software based on orders from specific users • development, production, supply and documentation of ready-made (non-customized) software • writing of programs following directives of the user

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - reproduction of non-customized software, see 22.33 - software consultancy related to hardware consultancy, see 72.10

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - processing of data employing either the customer's or a proprietary program: • complete processing of data • data entry services - management and operation on a continuing basis of data-processing facilities belonging to others

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - database development: assembly of data from one or more sources - data storage: preparation of a computer record for such information in a predetermined format - database availability: provision of data in a certain order or sequence, by on-line data retrieval or accessibility (computerized management) to everybody or to limited users, sorted on demand

Label.LabelText: Maintenance and repair of office, accounting and computing machinery
Maintenance and repair of office, accounting and computing machinery

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - basic research: • experimental or theoretical work undertaken primarily to acquire new knowledge of the underlying foundations of phenomena and observable facts, without particular application or use in view - applied research: • original investigation undertaken in order to acquire new knowledge, directed primarily towards a specific practical aim or objective - experimental development: • systematic work, drawing on existing knowledge gained from research and/or practical experience, directed to producing new materials, products and devices, to installing new processes, systems and services, and to improving substantially those already produced or installed

Label.LabelText: Research and experimental development on natural sciences and engineering
Research and experimental development on natural sciences and engineering

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - systematic studies and creative efforts in the three types of research and development defined above, in natural sciences (mathematics, physics, astronomy, chemistry, life sciences, medical sciences, earth sciences, agriculture, etc.). They are intended to increase the stock of knowledge and to improve the use of this stock of knowledge

Label.LabelText: Research and experimental development on social sciences and humanities
Research and experimental development on social sciences and humanities

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - systematic studies and creative efforts in the three types of research and development defined above, in social sciences and humanities (economics, psychology, sociology, legal sciences, linguistics and languages, arts, etc.). They are intended to increase the stock of knowledge and to improve the use of this stock of knowledge

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - market research, see 74.13

Label.LabelText: Legal, accounting, book-keeping and auditing activities; tax consultancy; market research and public opinion polling; business and management consultancy; holdings

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - legal representation of one party's interest against another party, whether or not before courts or other judicial bodies by, or under supervision of, persons who are members of the bar: • advice and representation in civil cases • advice and representation in criminal actions • advice and representation in connection with labour disputes - general counselling and advising, preparation of legal documents: • articles of incorporation, partnership agreements or similar documents in connection with company formation • patents and copyrights • preparation of deeds, wills, trusts, etc. - activities of notaries public, notaries, bailiffs, arbitrators, examiners and referees

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - arbitration and conciliation between labour and management, see 74.14 - law court activities, see 75.23

Label.LabelText: Accounting, book-keeping and auditing activities; tax consultancy

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - recording of commercial transactions from businesses or others - preparation of financial accounts, examination of such accounts and certification of their accuracy - preparation of personal and business income tax returns - advisory activities and representation (other than legal representation) on behalf of clients before tax authorities

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - data-processing and tabulation activities even for accounting purposes, see 72.30 - management consultancy such as design of accounting systems, cost accounting programmes, budgetary control procedures, see 74.14 - bill collection, see 74.84

Label.LabelText: Market research and public opinion polling

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - investigation into market potential, acceptance, and familiarity of products and buying habits of consumers for the purpose of sales promotion and development of new products, including statistical analyses of the results - investigation into collective opinions of the public about political, economic and social issues and statistical analysis thereof

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - provision of advice, guidance or operational assistance to businesses and the public service: • public relations and communication: • design of accounting systems, cost-accounting programmes, budgetary control procedures • advice and help to businesses and public services in planning, organization, efficiency and control, management information, etc. • management consultancy such as by agronomists and agricultural economists to farms, etc. • arbitration and conciliation between management and labour

Label.LabelText: Architectural and engineering activities and related technical consultancy
Architectural and engineering activities and related technical consultancy

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - consulting architectural activities: • building design and drafting • supervision of construction • town and city planning and landscape architecture - machinery and industrial plan design - engineering, project management and technical activities: • projects involving civil engineering, hydraulic engineering, traffic engineering • projects elaboration and realization relative to electrical and electronic engineering, mining engineering, chemical engineering, mechanical, industrial and systems engineering, safety engineering - elaboration of projects using air-conditioning, refrigerating, sanitary and pollution control engineering, acoustical engineering, etc. - geological and prospecting activities: • surface measurements and observation designed to yield information on subsurface structure and the location of petroleum, natural gas and mineral deposits and of ground water - weather forecasting activities - geodetic surveying activities: • land surveying activities • hydrographic surveying activities • subsurface surveying activities • boundary surveying activities • cartographic and spatial information activities, including aerial photography thereof • industrial and engineering surveying activities

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - test drilling and testhole boring, see 45.12 - research and development activities, see 73 - technical testing, see 74.30 - interior decorating, see 74.84

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - measuring related to cleanness of water or air, measuring of radioactivity and the like; analysis of potential pollution such as smoke or waste water - testing activities in the field of food hygiene - strength and failure testing - testing of calculations for building elements - certification of ships, aircraft, motor vehicles, pressurized containers, nuclear plant, etc. - periodic road-safety testing of motor vehicles

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - creation and realization of advertising campaigns: • creating and placing of outdoor advertising, e.g. billboards, panels, bulletins and frames, window dressing, showroom design, car and bus carding, etc. • media representation, i.e. sale of time and space for various media soliciting advertising • aerial advertising • distribution or delivery of advertising material or samples • provision of spaces for advertising

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - printing of advertising material, see 22.22 - market research, see 74.13 - public-relations activities, see 74.14 - advertising photography, see 74.81 - production of commercial messages for radio, television and film, see 92

Label.LabelText: Labour recruitment and provision of personnel
Labour recruitment and provision of personnel

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - personnel search, selection referral and placement in connection with employment supplied to the potential employer or to the prospective employee: • formulation of job descriptions • screening and testing of applicants • investigation of references, etc. - executive search and placement activities (headhunters) - labour-contracting activities: • supply to others, chiefly on a temporary basis, of personnel hired by, and whose emoluments are paid by, the agency

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - activities of farm labour contractors, see 01.4 - activities of personal theatrical or artistic agents, see 74.84 - motion picture, television and other theatrical casting activities, see 92.72

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - investigation activities - activities of private investigators - surveillance, guard and other protective activities: • transport of valuables • bodyguard activities • street patrol, guard and watchman activities for apartment buildings, offices, factories, construction sites, hotels, theatres, dancehalls, etc. • store detective activities • monitoring by mechanical or electrical protective devices - consultancy in the field of industrial, household and public service security - training of dogs for security reasons

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - installation of alarm systems, see 45.31 - investigation in connection with insurance, see 67.20

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - interior cleaning of buildings of all types, including offices, factories, shops, institutions and other business and professional premises and multiunit residential buildings - window cleaning - chimney cleaning and cleaning of fireplaces, stoves, furnaces, incinerators, boilers, ventilation ducts and exhaust units

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - disinfecting and exterminating activities for buildings, ships, trains, etc. - cleaning of trains, buses, planes, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - agricultural pest control, see 01.41 - steam-cleaning, sand blasting and similar activities for building exteriors, see 45.45 - cleaning of new buildings after construction, see 45.45 - carpet and rug shampooing, drapery and curtain cleaning, see 93.01 - activities of domestics, see 95.00

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - commercial and consumer photograph production: • portrait photography for passports, schools, weddings, etc. • photography for commercials, publishers, fashion, real estate or tourism purposes • aerial photography - film processing: • developing, printing and enlarging from client-taken negatives or cine-films • mounting of slides • copying and restoring or transparency retouching in connection with photographs

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - operation of photo coin-operated machines

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - processing motion-picture film related to the motion-picture and television industries, see 92.11

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - packaging activities, whether or not these involve an automated process: • filling of aerosols • bottling of liquids, including beverages and food • packaging of solids (blister packaging, foil covered, etc.) • labelling, stamping and imprinting • parcel packing and gift wrapping

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - packing activities incidental to transport, see 63.40

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - stenographic and mailing activities: • typing • other secretarial activities such as transcribing from tapes or discs • copying, blue printing, multigraphing and similar activities • envelope addressing, stuffing, sealing and mailing, mailing list compilation, etc., including for advertising material - translation and interpretation

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - proofreading

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - database activities cf 72.40 - bookkeeping activities, see 74.12

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - bill collecting, credit rating in connection with an individual's or firm's creditworthiness or business practices - business brokerage activities, i.e. arranging for the purchase and sale of small and medium-sized businesses, including professional practices - appraisal activities other than for real estate and insurance - fashion design related to textiles, wearing apparel, shoes, jewellery, furniture and other interior decoration and other fashion goods as well as other personal or household goods - trading stamp activities - activities of interior decorators - activities of fair, exhibition and congress organizers - activities of stand designers

PropertyQualifier.name: LimitContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - activities carried on by agents and agencies on behalf of individuals usually involving the obtaining of engagements in motion picture, theatrical production or other entertainment or sports attractions and the placement of books, plays, artworks, photographs, etc., with publishers, producers, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - credit card activities, see 65 - machinery and industrial plant design, see 74.20 - display of advertisement and other advertising design, see 74.40

Label.LabelText: Public administration and defence; compulsory social security
Public administration and defence; compulsory social security
Public administration and defence; compulsory social security
Administration of the State and the economic and social policy of the community

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - executive and legislative administration of central, regional and local bodies - administration and supervision of fiscal affairs: • operation of taxation schemes • duty/tax collection on goods and tax violation investigation • customs administration - budget implementation and management of public funds and public debt: • raising and receiving of moneys and control of their disbursement - administration and operation of overall economic and social planning and statistical and sociological services at the various levels of government

Label.LabelText: Regulation of the activities of agencies that provide health care, education, cultural services and other social services, excluding social security

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - public administration of programmes aimed to increase personal well-being: health, education, culture, sport, recreation, environment, housing, social services, etc.

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - compulsory social security activities, see 75.30 - education activities, see 80 - human health related activities, see 85.1 - sewage and refuse disposal and sanitation, see 90.00 - activities of libraries, public archives, museums and other cultural institutions, see 92.5 - sporting or other recreational activities, see 92.6, 92.7

Label.LabelText: Regulation of and contribution to more efficient operation of business

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - public administration and regulation of different economic sectors: agriculture, land use, energy and mining resources, infrastructure, transport, communication, hotels and tourism - administration of general labour affairs - implementation of regional development policy

Label.LabelText: Supporting service activities for the government as a whole

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - general personnel and other general service activities: • administration and operation of general personnel services, whether or not connected with a specific function • development and implementation of general personnel policies and procedures covering selection and promotion, rating methods, job description, evaluation and classification, administration of civil service regulations, etc. - administration, operation and support of overall general services: • centralized supply and purchasing services • maintenance and storage of government records and archives • operation of government owned or occupied buildings • operation of central offices and other general services not connected with a specific function

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - activities of historical archives, see 92.51

Label.LabelText: Provision of services to the community as a whole

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - administration and operation of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and diplomatic and consular missions stationed abroad or at offices of international organizations - administration, operation and support for information and cultural services intended for distribution beyond national boundaries - aid to foreign countries, whether or not routed through international organizations - provision of military aid to foreign countries - management of foreign trade, international financial and foreign technical affairs - international assistance, e.g. refugee or hunger relief programmes

PropertyQualifier.name: CentralContent
PropertyQualifier.PropertyText: - administration, supervision and operation of military defence affairs and land, sea, air and space defence forces such as: • combat forces of army, navy and airforce • engineering, transport, communications, intelligence, material, personnel and other non-combat forces and commands • reserve and auxiliary forces of the defence establishment • provision of equipment, structures, supplies, etc. • health activities for military personnel in the field - administration, operation and support of civil defence forces - support for the working-out of contingency plans and the carrying-out of exercises in which civilian institutions and populations are involved

PropertyQualifier.name: Exclusions
